echo.description: A basic command that echoes back the provided message. By Hubert F. Espinola I
help: Echos the word passed on the argument (example usage: /echo [words, statement]).

ban.description: A simple command that bans a specific word passed to the argument. By doing so, the user can either be banned or warned depending on the conditions added by the owner.
help: Un-bans the word you banned. (example usage: /unban [word])
